name: Speed Is Getting Out Of Control
name_original: Speed Is Getting Out Of Control
description:
Story:

You've managed to run away from bandits and hide in the asteroid field, but your hyperspeed engine is damaged. Try to fly as far as you can, but keep in mind that due to damages your speed will increase unpredictable and it quickly might get out of control.

Controls:

Arrows - Movement

Space - Laser shoot

Licenses:
